item.title: Substance Painter - notes
item.description: Material sets & ID Maps Material set (Maya) or shop_materialpath (Houdini). To make it easier to paint it can be good to organize the model using 2 separate models (of the same model) but where the materials are named and assigned differently. Lets say that we wish to separate a model into 3 different texture sets. “base”, “mid” and “top”. We create material called this and assigns them to the geo that we want to separate i.
